1050280.name: Kaion Tale MMORPG
1050280.description:
Immerse yourself in a magical 2D world with thousands of online players in this MMORPG!

* Factions
Choose a side in this great story! Fight with the Draxian nobles or the ferocious Naru.

* PvP
Fight other players in this open world or compete in the world ranking to get fabulous prizes or rewards!

*Exploration
Explore a huge open world full of magic and adventures to reveal. Meet new friends on your own adventure!

* Professiones
Choose between 3 professions: mining, elementalism and jewelry.

*Enchantment
Upgrade your items by enchanting them to make them unique.

*Commerce
Make exchanges with other players to get items, materials, minerals and even pets!
Search for that item that you love it in the Auction House!

*Emotes
React with emotes to have fun with other friends in game.

History:
Recent military encounters have unleashed a new war between the Draxian and the Naru.

Join the noble draxian warriors, those who fight for justice and order.
Or fight alongside the ancestral Naru tribe, defending nature and balance in the universe.

Create new friends and play with thousands of people online!
1050280.supported_languages:
英语*, 葡萄牙语 - 巴西, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲, 法语, 德语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
